title: Workshop on Designing Degree Theses Linked to Teaching Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in language education and thesis writing experience
context.additional_context: Requires customized instructional design considering adult learners' diverse academic backgrounds.

learning_goals: Learners can independently conduct research designs aligned with teacher-education-linked thesis topics.
Learners can apply interdisciplinary research methodologies through participatory inquiry dialogues.
Learners enhance their ability to draft thesis first drafts using digital resources in a smartphone-based LMS environment.
Learners can evaluate the validity of research topics through a peer feedback system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
